title: 【Student Dormitory】Please claim personal belongings in the storage area as soon as possible
author: 鍾佩玲
content:
分類： 行政公告
來源： 學務處 - 鍾佩玲 - free22011@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話03-3890-6217
對象： 全校學生
標題： 【Student Dormitory】Please claim personal belongings in the storage area as soon as possible
日期： Tue, 3 Oct 2023 15:28:48 +0800

Dear All,

    In order to provide a clean and comfortable accommodation, the students who haven’t claim the personal belongings in dorms are required to claim personal belongings stored in the storage area before 2023/10/31 (Tue). Any luggage not claimed will be gathered to a different location. Items not picked up before 2023/12/31 (Sun) will be treated as waste and the school will not be responsible for storage and compensation. Please kindly claim your belongings in time. Thank you~

~ Office of Student Affairs and Life Division ~
